document_data.name: Surrolph Hlakken
document_data.mainbody: '''Surrolph Hlakken''' was a [[horse]] merchant at the [[Hlakken Stables]] in [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Description: Surrolph was a fat, balding man with thick fingers.
document_data.Possessions: Surrolph wore a set of fine [[robe]]s whose sheen had by [[1372 DR]] long since faded.
document_data.Activities: While his surface job was that as a horse merchant at the Hlakken Stables, Surrolph was also a contact of the vigilante group [[Red Sashes]]. He was considered to be their chief information gatherer.
